attributes.action: Force all mps and political party leaders to publish their tax returns
attributes.background: People should be able to scrutinise the tax returns of 1) those who are able to change this country's laws which we are obliged to follow or 2) those who lead political parties represented in parliament. This will help ensure conflicts of interest are exposed before laws are passed affecting us all.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/126785

Parliament could not require leaders of political parties who are not MPs to publish their tax return, unless it changed the law.
